name: losartan potassium and hydrochlorothiazide

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

indications: Losartan potassium and hydrochlorothiazide tablets are combination of losartan, an angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB) and hydrochlorothiazide, a diuretic indicated for:
contraindications: Hypertension Usual starting dose: 50/12.5 mg once daily. ( 2.1 ) Titrate as needed to a maximum dose of 100/25 mg. ( 2.1 ) Hypertensive Patients with Left Ventricular Hypertrophy Not controlled on monotherapy: Initiate with 50/12.5 mg.      Titrate as needed to a maximum of 100/25 mg. ( 2.2 )
warningsAndPrecautions:
Losartan potassium and hydrochlorothiazide tablets, USP are supplied as:
                  50 mg/12.5 mg Tablets: Yellow colored, oval shaped, biconvex, film-coated tablets with "U" debossed on one side and plain on other side.
                  NDC: 72162-2462-0: 1000 Tablets in a BOTTLE
                  NDC: 72162-2462-3: 30 Tablets in a BOTTLE
                  NDC: 72162-2462-9: 90 Tablets in a BOTTLE
                  Store at 20째 to 25째C (68째 to 77째F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Keep container tightly closed. Protect from light.
                  Repackaged/Relabeled by:Bryant Ranch Prepack, Inc.Burbank, CA 91504
adverseReactions: Hypersensitivity to any component of losartan      potassium and hydrochlorothiazide tablets. ( 4 ) Anuria. ( 4 ) Coadministration with aliskiren in      patients with diabetes. ( 4 )
